A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Easily the worst star wars film made excluding phantom menace. \nRian Johnson has turned a potential and rich universe of star wars into an simplified childs adventure. Almost every single interesting storyline we were left waiting after force awakens has been ruined Or dropped In this film.  \nThe half a star im giving is representing the hope I have for J. J. Abrams to fix all the major plot hole and to give the final saga and its characters the proper ending they deserve.
